Explanation: Copies somefile(s) unless there is a *newer* file with the same name in target_dir.
Copies somefile(s) with the original permissions and ownerships (the default is putting the ones of the user issuing the command)
Prompts the user to confirm before overwriting any file
Shows the files in a directory in long format, *but the first column is a unique identifier of the data of a file*. If two files share the same "inode" number, one was created as a hard link.
